# DemoStoke Gear Index
DemoStoke indexes real-world rental and used gear with location context and freshness timestamps.

## High-value indexes
- https://www.demostoke.com/gear
- https://www.demostoke.com/gear/surfboards
- https://www.demostoke.com/gear/used-skis

## API
- https://www.demostoke.com/api/gear/search?q=
